content: Hey there what doing bluethisg

BlueThistle AI specializes in AI-powered chatbots and automation solutions to enhance business efficiency and customer service. Please check our website for detailed information on our services and offerings【5†source】. If you have any specific questions or need assistance getting started, feel free to ask!
What is the pricing

The pricing for BlueThistle AI's packages is as follows:
- **Basic AI Package**: Setup Fee of £500, Monthly Retainer of £750 (optional).
- **Advanced AI Package**: Setup Fee of £750, Monthly Retainer of £1,200 (optional).
- **24/7 AI Support Package (Premium)**: Setup Fee of £1,000, Monthly Retainer of £1,500 (optional)【5†source】.
How does the 24/7 package benefit my business?

The 24/7 AI Support Package provides constant support to ensure uninterrupted customer service, enhancing customer satisfaction and business efficiency. It offers round-the-clock assistance, optimizing customer interactions and service delivery【5†source】.
Can you connect the chatbot up to my team calender for booking appointments through chatbots

BlueThistle AI's chatbots can be integrated with your team calendar to facilitate booking appointments directly through chatbots. This integration streamlines the appointment scheduling process and enhances customer convenience and service efficiency. For more details on this integration and how it can benefit your business, please visit our website or contact our team for personalized assistance【5†source】.
What other things can they do to help streamline my business

BlueThistle AI's chatbots offer various functionalities to streamline business processes, including:
- Automation for lead management
- Business process automation
- Automation for customer service
- NLP solutions for enhanced interaction
These services aim to improve efficiency, customer engagement, and overall business operations. For more detailed information on how these solutions can benefit your business, please visit our website【5†source】.
Where are they based?
BlueThistle AI is based in Scotland and operates remotely【5†source】. If you have any more questions or need further information, feel free to ask!
How do I get started

To get started with BlueThistle AI's services, please visit our "Get Started" page on our website for comprehensive details on the onboarding process, service options, and next steps【5†source】. If you need any assistance or have specific questions while getting started, feel free to ask for help!
I can't find the page

I recommend visiting BlueThistle AI's "Get Started" page directly by clicking on the following link: [Get Started](https://bluethistleai.co.uk/get-started/) for detailed information on starting with our services【5†source】.
What is there contact information

You can reach BlueThistle AI at:
- **Email**: Team@Bluethistleai.co.uk
- **Phone**: +44 7721 843189
- **Office Hours**: Monday to Friday: 9 AM - 6 PM, Saturday: 9 AM - 4 PM【5†source】. 

If you need further assistance or have more questions, feel free to ask!
Thank you
You're welcome! If you have any more questions in the future or need assistance, don't hesitate to reach out. Have a great day!
Where can I download the free ebook

You can download our free eBook to learn more about AI chatbots and automation. By subscribing to our newsletter, the download link will be sent to you via email. If you have any trouble accessing the eBook, feel free to let me know!
Where can I find more information on automation

For more information on automation solutions offered by BlueThistle AI, including automation in action, lead management, customer service, analytics, and business process automation, please visit our website for detailed insights and benefits【5†source】. If you have specific questions about automation or need further details, feel free to ask!
How long does it take to ta

If you are inquiring about the timeframes for setting up the AI packages:
- **Basic AI Package**: 2 to 3 weeks.
- **Advanced AI Package**: 4 to 6 weeks.
- **24/7 AI Support Package**: 6 to 8 weeks【5†source】.
All packages include a follow-up 1 week after delivery. If you have more questions or need clarification, feel free to ask!
Ye I was thank
You're welcome! If you have any more questions or need assistance in the future, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
